about_the_game:
This DLC is for those who enjoyed Motherless - Season 1 and want to support the game and its development.

By purchasing this DLC, you'll be granted the title of "Supporter", which you'll be able to see on the game's main menu!

You will also be able to access a special image gallery.

content_descriptors.notes:
MOTHERLESS is a Visual Novel (VN) for adults with explicit sex scenes. Not intended for audiences under 18 years old.

The game graphically depicts alcohol, the use of violence and drug references. If you are easily offended, this one is not for you.

All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
This DLC is for those who enjoyed Motherless - Season 1 and want to support the game and its development.

By purchasing this DLC, you'll be granted the title of "Supporter", which you'll be able to see on the game's main menu!

You will also be able to access a special image gallery.
name: Motherless - Season 1: Support DLC 2.0

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This DLC is for those who enjoyed the game and want to support it and its development.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
